text: Mr. Macmillan said we could be more help to the Commonwealth through the strength we would gain in the Common Market than by isolation. He paid tribute to the development of the Common Market. "The Community (Common Market) has imparted an impetus and an economic growth to The Six. Above all, it is an idea which has gripped men's minds," he said.
handwritten_text: Mr. Macmillan said we could be more help to the Commonwealth through the strength we would gain in the Common Market than by isolation. He paid tribute to the development of the Common Market. "The Community (Common Market) has imparted an impetus and an economic growth to The Six. Above all, it is an idea which has gripped men's minds," he said.
